test.query: SELECT count(c) FROM numbers_mt(38000000) AS a INNER JOIN (SELECT number, toString(number) AS c FROM numbers(750000)) AS b ON (a.number % 10000000) = b.number settings join_algorithm='hash'
SELECT count(c) FROM numbers_mt(38000000) AS a INNER JOIN (SELECT number, toString(number) AS c FROM numbers(750000)) AS b ON (a.number % 10000000) = b.number settings join_algorithm='parallel_hash'
